 Well this'll go over like a fart church, I thought this was private e-mai=
l.  Ghost research, and ITC research seem to be two different things or fie=
lds, and maybe they should kept seperate. 


To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comFro=
m: franks-boxes@...: Fri, 9 Nov 2007 13:49:47 -0700Subject: RE:=
 [EVP-ITC] Re: You tube?




 I think I'll start making a distinction betwe=
en the typical paranormal investigator moron, and ITC. The paranormal twits=
 seem to have no concept of what spirit acutally is, and how it's possible =
to communicate. I'm tired to arguing with the idiots. I can't get past thei=
r huge egos to make teh point that it's not white noise, and spirits can tr=
avel. I just had another go round with one of Rosemary Guiley's friends, he=
r tech, these people just can't hear what I'm trying to say. 
   Frank  

T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: urkel23@...: Fri, 9 Nov 2007 20:09:=
23 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: You tube?


Paranormal Experts??? Is there s=
uch a thing, are we talking about the field that has ideas and theories and=
 no solid evidence of anything to back it up? It's like being an expert at =
something that you can't prove exists in the first place. We would have a b=
etter shot of being an expert at picking the winning lottery numbers than p=
roving to someone that an afterlife exists.-Steve H.--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:>> > Yeah, he's got the gr=
umpy attitude! I just wanted to get some audio and video out here so the av=
erage person could hear what it's supposed to sound like unfiltered by some=
 paranormal expert. Unfrotunate that it'll probably create some demand. > >=
 Frank> > > To: EVP-ITC@...: urkel23@...: Fri, 9 Nov 2007 19:41:44 +0000Sub=
ject: [EVP-ITC] Re: You tube?> > > > > I can see it now ---- E-True hollywo=
od story: Frank Sumption. I'd know i'd watch, maybe they can get russell cr=
owe to play you in it.-Steve H.--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumpti=
on <franks-boxes@> wrote:>> > I get grumpy, and pissed. I try to share to i=
nformation about the box, and it's the same friggin' arguement everytime. I=
'm just now answering e-mails generated from the mistake of leaving a comme=
nt on a site about how I think most of what passes for paranormal knowledge=
 is Hollywood. I can't get past that shit, nor can I get past the egos, so =
I give up, they can't hear me. > > I think the problem is intellect, it tak=
es a certain level to be able to comprehend, and use the boxes, to everyone=
 else its' going to look fake, and sound like gibberish. > > > Frank-S> > >=
 > > To: EVP-ITC@: lisby@: Thu, 8 Nov 2007 20:29:08 -0500Subject: Re: [EVP-=
ITC] You tube?> > > > > You don't scare me. Never have. > > I'm tempted to =
add "nyanyanyanyanya." :)> > Ann> > > > On Nov 8, 2007, at 1:53 PM, Frank S=
umption wrote:> > > > > I don't don't know, I think I just scare everyone.>=
 > > To: evp-itc@: paranormalinvestigating@: Thu, 8 Nov 2007 11:42:31 -0500=
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] You tube?> > > Frank, I'll check tou tube and let yo=
u know. and if your a poor teacher how come everyone listens to what you ha=
ve to say ? bruce> > Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team > > > To:=
 evp-itc@: franks-boxes@: Thu, 8 Nov 2007 08:51:46 -0700Subject: [EVP-ITC] =
You tube?> > > Hi All; I tried to post a couple box video's on you tube las=
t night, they should come up if you do a search on Ghost Box, Frank's box, =
ITC, EVP, or paranormal, or maybe "PurpleAlienGirl" (user name). It's my fi=
rst attempt, so I'm not sure if it worked, and it's blocked here at work. B=
TW, I'm not sure if the Purple Princess stuff puts people off, that's who m=
y guys say I am, and I accept that as an axiom. As if it matters, but that'=
s an "other level" identity, and has little to do with physical conditions.=
 Purple is a treacher, that's all, I just happen to be a very poor teacher.=
